channel.title: Helpp! it says java not recognised
channel.description:
when i click runserver it says java is not recognised as a internal or external command, operbal program or batch file
please tell me what to do im so angry me and my family made this server it was working fine then i close it all out and put no ip too it and change inviroment variables and now it dont work and i only did what the tut said to do please help me out here. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 02:17:07 PM[/size][hr]please can any1 help me out

item.title: Helpp! it says java not recognised
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

Try redoing your “class” envioromental variable.
Open My Computer:

Local Disk (C:) < Program Files < Java < (The java you use. [Example:jdk1.6.0_10]) < Bin

Copy what ever is in your adress bar (Example: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin) is mine, Copy and paste that in your “class” in Enviromental Variables.

How do i get to Enviromental Variables?: Open my computer, click on “View System Information”, Click on the “advanced” tab, and at the very bottom should be a tab for changing Enviromental variables!
(THIS IS FOR WINDOWS, NOT SURE IF IT WORKS FOR VISTA ASWELL)

~I Lured I~

Read full topic
item.source: Helpp! it says java not recognised
